div.bibl: La Parola Del Popolo, June 2, 1923. LECTURE GIVEN BY MR. ROMUALDI

body.p: Saturday, May 26, Comrade Romualdi gave a lecture at the Chicago Commons in which he explained how Fascism was created and how it rose to power. He also explained how every attempt to check it was frustrated.

Extolling the Russian revolution, he praised the methods used in conducting and winning it. He defended the Italian Socialist Party from the accusation that the Party is a traitor to the working class, and defined the accusation as an undeserved calumny.
